# maximumItemSize

**Instance Property**

The largest allowable size for an item’s view.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var maximumItemSize: NSSize { get set }
```

## Discussion

Use this property to limit the maximum size of items displayed in the grid. The default value of this property is (`0.0`, `0.0`), which imposes no maximum size for items.

## Specifying the Grid Parameters

- **maximumNumberOfRows**: The maximum number of rows to display in the collection view’s visible area.
- **maximumNumberOfColumns**: The maximum number of columns to display in the collection view’s visible area.
- **minimumItemSize**: The smallest allowable size for an item’s view.
